meanings.sent1: The complementarinesses of colors in the painting made it visually appealing.
meanings.sent2: The chef understood the complementarinesses of flavors in the dish.
meanings.sent3: The complementarinesses of the mismatched socks actually looked quite stylish.
meanings.sent4: Their teamwork displayed a complementarinesses that was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The complementarinesses of the music and dance created a harmonious performance.

meanings.sent1: She appreciated the complementarinesses of the furniture in the room.
meanings.sent2: The success of their collaboration was due to the complementarinesses of their skills.
meanings.sent3: The complementarinesses of their outfits unintentionally matched perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The complementarinesses of their personalities made them a great team.
meanings.sent5: The complementarinesses of the ingredients resulted in a delicious meal.

meanings.definition: The relationship between two things that enhance or emphasize each other's qualities.
meanings.sent1: The complementarinesses between the sweet and savory flavors created a unique taste.
meanings.sent2: Their friendship was based on the complementarinesses of their personalities.
meanings.sent3: The complementarinesses of their interests led to many engaging conversations.
meanings.sent4: The complementarinesses of light and shadow added depth to the photograph.
meanings.sent5: The complementarinesses of the actors' performances brought the play to life.
